mapper.insert:
select CAR_PARK_INFO_TB.nextval from dual
insert into CAR_PARK_INFO_TB values( #{car_park_id}, #{car_park_license,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{car_in_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{car_park_type,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{carport_id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{car_park_status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select * from FOUR_USER_TB where USER_NAME =#{user_name} and USER_PSW=#{user_psw}
